thread.title: BlackBerry announces Year-End and Q4 fiscal 2017 results
thread.title_full: BlackBerry announces Year-End and Q4 fiscal 2017 results

author: Bla1ze
title: BlackBerry announces Year-End and Q4 fiscal 2017 results
text:
"I am pleased to report that our Q4 results came in at or above expectations in all major metrics," said John Chen, Executive Chairman and CEO, BlackBerry.

BlackBerry has now announced their Year-End and Q4 fiscal 2017 results. Non-GAAP revenue for the fourth quarter of fiscal 2017 was $297 million with GAAP revenue of $286 million. Approximately 80% of the fourth quarter Software & Services segment revenue (excluding IP licensing and professional services) was recurring. BlackBerry had over 3,500 enterprise customer orders in the quarter.
Read More Â»
